Field.label: Northern Grid Boundary
Field.toolTip: The Northern Latitude boundary for your area of interest.

Field.label: Southern Grid Boundary
Field.toolTip: The Southeren Latitude boundary for your area of interest.

Field.label: Western Grid Boundary
Field.toolTip: The Westeren Longitude boundary for your area of interest.

Field.label: Eastern Grid Boundary
Field.toolTip: The Eastern Longitude boundary for your area of interest.

Field.label: Grid Resolution
Field.toolTip: Determines the resolution of the resulting dataset. Selecting '50 meter cells' will use a higher resolution bathymetry and give better results, but will cause the request to take longer to complete.

Field.label: Fish Model Algorithm
Field.toolTip: The algorithm to apply for fish movement.

HField.label: Home Range Center (X value)
HField.toolTip: X coordinate of the home range center given as proportion of the x axis.

HField.label: Home Range Center (Y value)
HField.toolTip: Y coordinate of the home range center given as proportion of the y axis.

HField.label: Home Range Extent (X value)
HField.toolTip: SD of the utilization distribution in the x direction in meters.

HField.label: Home Range Extent (Y value)
HField.toolTip: SD of the utilization distribution in the y direction in meters.

HField.label: Directional Correlation of Home Range
HField.toolTip: The correlation between x and y directions, -1 < x < 1.

Field.label: Restrict Vertical Habitat Range
Field.toolTip: Restricts fish to habitat cells within a given depth range.

HField.label: Min Depth
HField.toolTip: Specifies the shallowest cell a fish will visit.

HField.label: Max Depth
HField.toolTip: Specifies the deepest cell a fish will visit.

Field.label: Use Depth Preference
Field.toolTip: Normally distributes fish in the water column according to a given mean and SD.

HField.label: Preferred Depth
HField.toolTip: Depth preference of fish relative to bottom (in meters off the bottom).

HField.label: SD of Preferred Depth
HField.toolTip: Strength of depth preference as a standard deviation, 95% of the time is spent within plus minus 2*SD.

Field.label: User-Specified Sensors
Field.toolTip: These sensors are placed and down-weighed before running the program. Useful for including already existing sensors, or forcing the placement of a few sensors. Do not include these sensors in the sensor count below. Provide sensor locations as a string in the format: sensor1_X, sensor1_Y, sensor2_X, sensor2_Y where sensor_k_X is the X cell index of sensor k, and sensor_k_Y is the Y cell index of sensor k.

Field.label: Number of Sensors to Use
Field.toolTip: The number of sensors you wish to place.

Field.label: Number of Sensors to Project
Field.toolTip: The number of theoretical sensors to place. These sensors will be placed in addition to any sensors specified above. This option lets you see what adding more sensors to your setup does to your recovery rate.

Field.label: 'Goodness' Algorithm
Field.toolTip: Determines how the program determines the goodness of a cell. A value of 1 bases goodness on fish presence, regardless of bathymetry. A value of 2 bases goodness on bathymetric visibility, regardless of fish presence A value of 3 bases goodness on the number of visible fish (both fish habitat and bathymetry).

Field.label: Sensor Elevation
Field.toolTip: Elevation of all sensors off of the bottom in meters.

Field.label: Sensor Shape Function
Field.toolTip: Determines which shape function to use for simulating signal attenuation.

Field.label: Max Detection Value
Field.toolTip: The probability of detecting a fish right next to your sensor. Specifies a maximum value for the shape function.

Field.label: Detection Range
Field.toolTip: The distance in meters from the sensor where the chance of detecting a signal is 0.05.

Field.label: Suppression Factor
Field.toolTip: Specifies the ratio of suppression range to sensor detection range.

Field.label: Suppression Function
Field.toolTip: The suppression function to use.

Field.label: Max Suppression Value
Field.toolTip: Specifies the maximum suppression penalty to apply.

Field.label: Min Suppression Value
Field.toolTip: Specifies the minimum suppression penalty to apply.
